headline.main: VICHY EXPECTING SHOWDOWN SOON; Steps on 'Collaboration' and Internal Situation Are Held Possible Today

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Aug. 1 -- For weeks a showdown has been impending regarding the internal situation in France and "collaboration" with Germany. There are signs tonight that it may be near. There may possibly be developments tomorrow after the customary Saturday meeting of the Cabinet.
abstract: Showdown expected soon on internal situation and collaboration; Berne sources hear Berlin seeks new and stronger Govt
